# Arithmatic 
## Addition and Subtraction
### Let's start real slow...
So we all know that
$$2+2 =4$$
But addition and subtraction have some cool rules

### Properties of Addition and subtraction
* Communiciative:
    + $a\pm b = b \pm a$
* Associative
    + $(a\pm b) \pm c = a \pm (b\pm c)$
